TEXT.FORM: gongxun jɤxtshi lɤ-ɣe tɕe, a-ɣe ɣɯ ɯ-pɤro ci qiche kɯ-xtɕi ci to-χtɯ. tɕe andi ra ata. tɕetha a-ɣe thɯ-ɣe tɕe nɯrge ma andi ra ata. tɕe dɯxpa ma nɯ ɯ-pɤro ra jo-ɣɯt. tɕe i-kha ci tɤ-rɯndzɤtshi qhe tɕe jɤ-anɯri. wo tɤ-rɯndzɤtshi tʂhɯɣ me ma to-rɯndzɤtshi tɕe jɤ-ɣe ɕti tɕe tɕe aʑo taʁ tɤ-ari-a ri tɕe tɕe pjɯ-ɣi-a ɕɯŋgɯ tɕe jo-nɯɕe tɕe nɯ ɯ-qhu mɯ-nɯ-atɯɣ-tɕi. tɕe Tsheyag laoshi ɯ-ɕki ɕe-a ra ɲɯ-ti tɕe nɯ jɤ-ari ŋu ma tɕe mɯ-nɯ-atɯɣ-tɕi.
